name: Battle Ball (itch) (Ronsterdog)
description:
Battleball is a team-based couch-multiplayer fighting sports game where you assume the role of an athletic robot equipped with unique and powerful abilities. Battle your friends in a hybrid game that combines soccer, dodgeball, and straight up fist fighting. Coordinate as a team to maneuver opponents to where you want them and bend the arena to your advantage! 

After playing, Please fill out this FEEDBACK SURVEY If you get the chance!!! We'll need all the  feedback we can get to make this game as fun as possible! 

Feel free to join our DISCORD SERVER as well! 

Credits:

  • Ronie Gabriel Altejar - Game Lead, Programming, Character Design/Modeling/Animation, UI/UX, VFX
  • Chancellor Piazza - Environment and Stage Design/Modeling
  • Rachel Nelson - Managing/Marketing
  • YoonSuk Hur - Sound Design/ Music

Please Note:

  • This is  local-co-op You're gonna need some controllers to play with friends !!
  • Player 1 can use keyboard if you are down a controller
